title: 91. (acne part 2) lifestyle factors that could be making it worse.
description:
Welcome to The Treatment Room! In this episode, I'm sharing lifestyle factors that could be worsening your acne. If you haven't already, make sure to listen to episode #90 before this one, for an intro to acne and how it starts.
